name: PetRobo Mr. Foxy
description:
Mr Foxy
weapon : Pet Robo machine guns
power : 3/5
defence : 3/5
soul :4/5

story :
Mr Foxy is a fox who is used to stealing the chickens raised by the old man in the village of Velocity. Several times the old man saw Mr Foxy steal his chicken but he let him. Since the arrival of evil forces on Earth and the old man being one of the victims who were kidnapped by evil forces, Mr Foxy was touched and wanted to help him. With his stealing skills, Mr Foxy managed to steal the blueprints of the secret weapons of evil forces and turn them into robots equipped with weapons to deal with the forces of evil.
